attributes.action: Protect all nhs staff, teachers, all civil servants from covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Great everyone as equal. All civil servants shouldn't be abused, verbally or physically get the government and health boards are bullying people into working as long as possible, even if they spread the disease. Instead of bullying they need rewarding. Covid -19 is not their fault, yet they have to deal with it, with let's be honest, not very transparent information. Prepare everyone and not the few. Take care of everyone and not the few.
attributes.background: Nhs staff and civil servants are being forced to work with mild covid-19 symptoms, they have a right to health too, you barely protect front line staff, yet behind the scenes who are also in contact there is nothing. Front like a staff have families and friends too.
